EDGE Algorithms

Extended General Einsums for Graph Algorithms (EDGE)

Single-Source Shortest Path (Example)

Minimal example showing how an EDGE algorithm page is structured.

Status Intro

This is a demo algorithm page. Replace each section with your EDGE content. You can include inline math like $d_i$ and display math like: \(d_i = \min_j (d_j + w_{ji})\)

Define the shortest path problem in the EDGE notation and set up inputs/outputs.

Provide a small graph and initialize values.

Working Example Part 2

Walk through one or two iterations of the algorithm.

EDGE Expression Walkthrough

Explain each line of the EDGE expression in words.

EDGE Expression

\[d_i \leftarrow \min_j (d_j + w_{ji})\]
